nodes.text: Shadowports were spaceports used by smugglers, ship thieves, and other criminally linked spacers. Quite often, shadowports were hidden to provide protection from authorities, with their locations only known to reputable spacers.
Notable shadowports were located on Kothlis and somewhere in the Tapani Sector. Booster Terrik's Errant Venture was probably one of the better-known shadowports.
